detail_desc: Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waistband, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.

Knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a unique nursing feature that can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards. V-neck, decorative gathers at the front to create a gently draping effect and long sleeves. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Joggers in patterned jersey with a soft brushed finish. Drawstring at the waist, wide elasticated ribbing at the top, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Leggings in soft, supple leather with a thin cotton lining. High waist with concealed elastication, a zip at one side and legs with decorative seams and raw-edge hems.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cap in cotton twill with an appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Iron-on fabric patch to patch and repair garments. Height. 10 cm. Width 10 cm.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Briefs in microfibre with decorative seams at the front, a lined gusset and wide sides. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved, hooded jacket in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Diameter from 1.5 cm to 2.5 cm.
Short shorts in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a high, elasticated waist and drawstring with twisted, tasselled ties. Side pockets and inset hemstitching at the hems.
Bag in paper straw containing glittery threads with two handles at the top, sequined embroidery and tassels at the front. Lined. Size 9x23.5x27 cm.

Playsuit in heavily draping jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, and a horizontal strap at the back of the neck. Long trumpet sleeves and a gathered, elasticated seam and narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a V-neck and drawstring at the front.
Short, A-line dress in an airy weave with tiny smocking and a V-shaped opening with ties at the neckline. Short, wide raglan sleeves, and a gathered seam at the hem for added width.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist, lined front and slightly longer legs. The cotton content of the trunks is organic.

Shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Running backpack in woven fabric with a padded, mesh-covered back and padded, shaped shoulder straps that can be held together by an adjustable chest strap with a plastic fastener. The chest strap has a slide fastener for easy height adjustment. Wider, adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener, a large compartment with an earphone outlet and hanger at the top, and a zipped inner compartment. Elastic straps on the front and a zipped outer compartment at the bottom. Reflective details. Lined. Size 28x48 cm.
Padded gilet with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and diagonal pockets.

Sleeveless, draped body in mesh with a deep V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, and cut-out section at the back. Shoulder straps with a decorative knot detail at the front, a seam and a jersey lower section. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs. Jersey lining at the top.
Boxy T-shirt in soft fabric with gently dropped shoulders.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping satin with a high waist and concealed zip and button at one side. Unlined.

Set with a top and pair of jeggings. Top in sweatshirt fabric with soft, padded appliqués on the front, long sleeves, concealed press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Jeggings in a stretch cotton blend with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Fake welt pockets at the back and straight legs with creases.
Long-sleeved blouse in dobby-weave cotton with frill details, a small stand-up collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with smocking and a narrow frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and wide lace trims at the cuffs and hem.
Tights in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the top and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.
Comfort blanket in soft velour with an animal-shaped head and paws. Polyester filling. Length approx. 31 cm.
Sunglasses with matt plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Balconette bra in lace and mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Hook-and eye fastening at the back.
CONSCIOUS: Short-sleeved jersey top in a soft organic cotton blend.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, high collar at the front and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Thermal fleece inside.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a small opening with a drawstring at the hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with lace-trimmed, asymmetric cuffs, slits in the sides and a lace trim at the hem.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Tunic in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Small frilled collar an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves, wide cuffs with a flounce and covered buttons, and a flounce at the hem. Inner tunic in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text motif at the top and a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
3/4-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring and a concealed key pocket in the waistband, and ventilating mesh sections on the legs.

Calf-length kaftan woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke that continues down the sleeves, pleats at the front and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Short top in jersey with a mesh-covered, beaded front and metallic shimmer. Narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Lined at the front.
Gently fitted jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and a button at the front. Flap front pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with gathers, and a single back vent. Lined.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Knee-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with narrow ties, and an overlocked hem. Unlined.
Leggings in jersey containing glittery threads. Elasticated waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and a round neckline with a narrow trim.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip with a decorative tab and press-studs down the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Side pockets, a sleeve pocket with a zip and one inner pocket. Lined.
Short-sleeved lace dress with a concealed zip in the side, seam at the waist and pleated skirt. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in a cotton knit with appliqués. Ties under the chin. Fleece lining.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck, concealed silicone trim at the top. and shoulder straps. Concealed zip at the back, side pockets and wide elastication at the sides of the back.
Ankle-length chinos in stretch cotton with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems with creases.
Jumper in a super-soft fine knit with a wrapover V-neck and a practical inner top for ease of nursing access.
Fitted top in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck with lacing.
Dungarees in stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal buckles and a two-part chest pocket, front and back pockets, a zip in the side, fake fly and tapered legs.
Scarf in a soft knit. Size 28x180 cm.
Tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, yoke at the back and buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie belt and a rounded hem.
Metal earrings in the shape of flowers and leaves decorated with rhinestones.
Skirt in a patterned weave with a slight sheen. Glittery elastic waistband, decorative bow at the front and a layer of glittery tulle.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft weave with a collar, V-neck opening and buttons down the front. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Sleeveless romper suits in soft organic cotton jersey with adjustable press-stud fastenings on the shoulders and a patch pocket at the top. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Joggers in sturdy cotton piqué. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, discreet pockets in the side seams, a fake back pocket and ribbed hems.
Mesh shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Hair elastic decorated with a large bow.
Top in sturdy cotton jersey with a flock print on the front, round neckline, long sleeves and short slits in the sides.
High-waisted jersey leggings.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a glow-in-the-dark print motif on the front and long sleeves.
Fine-knit trainers with an elasticated top edge and grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh insoles.
Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a pleated weave with a double flounce at the top, short sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Satin lining.
